category.name: Schedule Manager
category.category_description: Allows configuring of Schedule Manager functionality.

preference.name: SM_AUTO_EXTEND_MASTER_SCHEDULE_DATE
preference.preference_description: Specifies whether to extend the start and finish dates of the master schedule based on the sub-schedule being inserted. The valid values are: * true: Extend the start date and finish date of the master schedule. * false: Do not extend the start date and finish date of the master schedule. This is the default value.
